question: Name the ordinance that was promulgated by President Pranab Mukherjee on 30 December 2016.
option1: Specified Bank Notes (Cessation of Liabilities) Ordinance, 2016
option3: Scheduled Castes and the Scheduled Tribes (Prevention of Atrocities) Amendment Ordinance, 2016
answer: Specified Bank Notes (Cessation of Liabilities) Ordinance, 2016
